Prerequisites¶

This page describes the environment and dependencies needed to run the application and tests.

Installation instructions¶

Python version¶

  • Python 3.13 is recommended (matches CI).

  1. Create and activate a virtual environment:

    python3 -m venv .venv
. .venv/bin/activate

  2. Install Python dependencies:

    python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt

    This installs the Flask app, database drivers, and test tooling.

  3. Set required environment variables:

    export DATABASE_URL="postgresql://localhost/grad_cafe"

  4. Run the test suite (optional):

    pytest -m "web or buttons or analysis or db or integration"

Running the app¶

From the project root:

export DATABASE_URL="postgresql://localhost/grad_cafe"
flask --app src run

Alternatively:

python -m src

Planned content¶

  • Python version and package requirements

  • PostgreSQL configuration (DATABASE_URL)

  • Optional local LLM setup for llm_hosting
